name: swing-music
description: SwingMusic is a self-hosted music streaming server and player with playlists, search, and a modern responsive UI for listening to your own collection.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Streams personal music collection through web interface

features.title: Library Scanning
features.description: Automatically scans and indexes music files with metadata

features.title: Playlist Management
features.description: Creates and manages playlists with drag-and-drop organization

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Finds songs, albums, and artists quickly with instant search

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Displays cover art from embedded tags or online sources

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Builds and reorders playback queue dynamically
